title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t0.0
text: You might not often hear terms like empathy and design thinking when talking about AI

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t7.0
text: projects, but on today's episode, find out how one pharma company's AI center of excellence

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t11.96
text: takes a holistic approach to technology projects.

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t16.080000000000002
text: I'm Tonya Sideri from Novo Nordisk, and you're listening to Me, Myself and AI.

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t22.580000000000002
text: Welcome to Me, Myself and AI, a podcast on artificial intelligence and business.

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t27.64
text: Each episode, we introduce you to someone innovating with AI.

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t31.36
text: I'm Sam Ransbotham, professor of analytics at Boston College.

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t35.52
text: I'm also the AI and business strategy guest editor at MIT Sloan Management Review.

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t41.120000000000005
text: And I'm Shervin Khodobande, senior partner with BCG, and I co-lead BCG's AI practice

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t46.519999999999996
text: in North America.

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t47.84
text: Together, MIT SMR and BCG have been researching and publishing on AI for six years, interviewing

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t54.48
text: hundreds of practitioners and surveying thousands of companies on what it takes to build and

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t59.519999999999996
text: to deploy and scale AI capabilities and really transform the way organizations operate.

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t67.67999999999999
text: Today Shervin and I are joined by Tonya Sideri, head of Novo Nordisk AI center of excellence.

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t72.72
text: Tonya, thanks for joining us.

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t74.24
text: Welcome.

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t75.24
text: Let's get started.

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t76.24
text: First, maybe can you tell us what Novo Nordisk does?

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t79.56
text: We are a global pharma company.

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t81.36
text: We are headquartered here in Denmark and we are focusing on producing drugs, supporting

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t86.64
text: patients with chronic diseases such as diabetes, obesity, hemophilia, and growth disorders.

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t95.12
text: We are 100 year old company, but still growing a lot, but still very committed to original

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t100.48
text: values of the company and to our social responsibilities.

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t104.24
text: There's more than 34 million diabetes patients using our products and we produce more than

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t110.44000000000001
text: 50% of the world's insulin supply.

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t114.44000000000001
text: Currently you lead the AI center of excellence.

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t117.48
text: So what is an AI center of excellence?

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t119.76
text: What is your role there?

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t120.76
text: What does that mean?

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t121.76
text: AI center of excellence can have different flares in different companies, but what we

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t126.4
text: do, we are a central team located in the companies of global IT.

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t131.4
text: We are a group of data scientists, machine learning engineers, and software developers

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t137.28
text: working via hub and spoke model across the company.

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t142.08
text: So we want to minimize our distance from ourselves and our experts in the company or data and

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t148.0
text: domain experts by working in cross functional teams, product teams across the company.

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t153.72
text: And we also want to increase the speed from where we go from a peer CEO of machine learning

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t159.0
text: model to production.

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t160.92000000000002
text: And that's why we have analytics partners working across the company.

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t165.4
text: And we also have an MLOps product team focusing on creating microservices across the whole

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t170.72
text: machine learning model lifecycle.

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t173.20000000000002
text: We want to take all the petabytes of data we consume as a company all the way from our

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t178.88
text: molecule identification to our clinical trials, to our commercial execution and production

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t184.20000000000002
text: and shipping of the products and take them from database, from flat files, from cloud

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t190.28
text: storage and convert them to something that is ultimately useful for the company and ultimately

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t197.36
text: support patients lives.

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t198.92000000000002
text: And that's what we are here for.

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t199.92000000000002
text: We want to bring this data to life.

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t202.72
text: We are around one and a half year old as a team, and we already have projects across

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t207.36
text: the company that we're working with our R&D, for example, with using knowledge graph to

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t212.92000000000002
text: identify molecules for insulin resistance.

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t216.8
text: We have deployed different marketing mix modelings and sales uplift recommendations models across

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t222.28
text: the different commercial regions.

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t225.0
text: And last but not least, we have recently deployed a deep learning machine learning model that

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t230.88000000000002
text: gives a vision inspection in our inspection lines.

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t234.20000000000002
text: And that's very important because it's an optimization on existing process.

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t238.0
text: However, it gave us a lot of skills of how to have live machine learning models in a

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t243.2
text: very regulated setup with this GMP set of good manufacturing practices.

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t249.28
text: How does that work?

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t251.28
text: Tell us more about that.

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t252.28
text: That seems quite interesting.

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t253.92
text: We were already using visual inspection the last 20 years from a rule based approach that

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t258.52
text: we have optimized.

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t260.32
text: And now we have used different deep learning models to improve that.

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t265.44
text: And of course, with deep learning, we're increasing the accuracy and the efficiency of the visual

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t269.68
text: inspection process and thereby increasing quality and reducing the amount of good product

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t275.52
text: going to waste due to particles being wrongly identified as defects.

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t280.16
text: So we save products and we optimize our products that way in a more efficient way.

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t286.48
text: And we also produce less waste of good particles going to waste.

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t291.0
text: But most importantly, what we get out of this project is the necessary capability of how

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t296.28
text: to do machine learning in very regulated spaces, for example, like manufacturing or pharma.

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t301.55999999999995
text: Tania, you've been a big advocate of design thinking in building data products, AI products.

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t309.55999999999995
text: Tell us more about what that means and why it's important.

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t313.23999999999995
text: Yes.

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t314.23999999999995
text: And I think it started first of all by, I used to be a data scientist myself.

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t318.0
text: So quite sometimes I found myself working in projects that I could see that they could,

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t323.35999999999996
text: they should have been killed earlier.

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t326.0
text: So my interest in this is how to speed up our time for failure.

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t331.44
text: And that's why when we started the area and that was one and a half year ago, we really

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t338.0
text: committed to actually start our projects by what we call a data to wisdom sprint.

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t343.82
text: So basically hackathon that we work together with our business colleagues in a period of

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t347.68
text: two weeks to really try to see what we can find from the data based on specific hypotheses.

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t355.08
text: And in the end of these two weeks, then we ask ourselves, is there any signal in the

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t360.64
text: noise?

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t361.64
text: Are the data good enough?

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t363.52
text: Do we have the necessary technology to scale that further?

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t367.4
text: And is there any business value out of this?

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t369.71999999999997
text: And if the answer is yes, then we go to the next step where we do to a POC, then to implementation

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t375.0
text: phase and of course operations.

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t377.76
text: But if the answer is no, then within two weeks, very quickly, we should be able to kill it.

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t382.5
text: And these two weeks we really use with the help of our agile coaches also quite some

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t386.42
text: design thinking techniques.

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t388.26
text: But for me it's the outcome of the design thinking.

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t390.62
text: How to use design thinking as a way to work cross-functionally and as a way to fail fast.

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t397.34
text: That's great.

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t398.34
text: No wisdom, you're killed.

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t399.34
text: Sort of like natural selection, right?

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t402.34
text: Joking aside, I think this is a great idea because Sam, like how many times we either

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t406.82
text: seen our data when we surveyed these thousands of companies or in our conversations with

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t412.56
text: executives where they are doing hundreds of POCs and pilots, but there is just literally

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t419.5
text: no value and there is truly what I call AI fatigue across the organization because it's

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t425.98
text: like the whole organization has become this graduate school of lab of like let's try this,

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t432.7
text: let's try that, let's try that.

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t433.86
text: So I love the idea of like just kill the ones that aren't working so you focus on a

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t438.54
text: handful that are valuable.

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t463.86
text: Exactly.

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t466.54
text: And for me also those that are not working, we also have a got a lot of learnings because

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t471.26
text: usually the reason that they're not working is related to data.

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t475.48
text: So at least we stress test the data for two weeks based on what we want to achieve and

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t479.82
text: then we get some learnings if we want to do this model in the future, what we need to

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t484.54
text: fix in our data to get there.

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t486.46000000000004
text: Ooh, that's fabulous because that's actually tying back and learning from what you, I mean

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t491.3
text: it's one thing to just kind of cut a project off and say, all right, well we're not going

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t494.18
text: to keep dumping money into that if it's not going to work, but then there's something

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t496.88
text: else to, if you keep starting projects just like that over and over again, there'd need

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t501.46000000000004
text: to be some learning that those are going to fail or what you can do to improve those in

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t506.46000000000004
text: the future.

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t507.46000000000004
text: What kind of numbers are we talking about here?

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t510.06
text: How much wisdom is there?

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t511.14
text: Is there a 2% wisdom, 20% wisdom, 97% wisdom?

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t515.88
text: I think it's very dangerous to try to quantify something like this, right?

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t519.62
text: But one is the data wisdom and the other of course is the change management wisdom because

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t525.26
text: we work together through this hackathon with our business experts.

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t529.94
text: So even if something fails, they understand their way of working and also we get a glimpse

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t534.38
text: of their reality and they get a glimpse of what can be possible.

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t539.86
text: And I think this wisdom is even more difficult to quantify because it will have a hopefully

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t546.02
text: a more kind of a wave impact effect in the future across the company.

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t551.86
text: If you look at the total opposite paradigm for what you're talking about is the old school

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t559.46
text: waterfall way of building these like gigantic tech pieces, right?

title: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri
id: From Data to Wisdom - Novo Nordisk's Tonia Sideri-t565.14
